steps.name: And choose carrier from the drop down
Then Click on contract filter button
And enter contract number in contract number field
And Uncheck the approved only Checkbox
And click on rate Card from dropdown list
And verify the approval history "Approved Revision"

fullName: Verify the TMS functionality: The user should be able to assign rate to the carrier sucessfully
